info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 7:21PM MDT until July 08 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Ravalli County in west central Montana... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 721 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hamilton, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Victor, Woodside, Pinesdale, Grantsdale, Bell Crossing and Corvallis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
